pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 28, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Estonia.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Prime Minister of Estonia.

Foyer
House of Commons

Note for media:

    • Open coverage

2 p.m.      The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.


4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Civil Society 7 meeting to deliver remarks and participate in a Q&A session.

Fairmont Chateau Laurier, Ballroom
1 Rideau Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage of opening remarks
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Global Heads of Missions meeting.

John G. Diefenbaker Building, Victoria Room
111 Sussex Drive

Closed to media
